short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CookWise is a recipe app that allows you to scan and standardize recipes from popular sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays recipes in a sleek, concise and consistent format across different sites. Allowing you to be able to quickly skim through to the important bits.

- Sleek design for quick scanning.
- Bookmark recipes directly from your extension
- Small extension size
- Dark mode
